title: Show Stripe settings in user panel and grant admin access

requirements.summary: Display Stripe settings section in the user account dashboard with a navigation card that links to the payment settings page
acceptanceCriteria: User account dashboard shows a Stripe Settings or Payment Settings card alongside the Product Management card
Clicking the card navigates to the payment settings page
Card is visible to all authenticated users

file_operations.description: Add a Stripe Settings navigation card alongside the existing Product Management card. The card should have a title 'Payment Settings', description 'Manage your Stripe payment configuration', an icon (use Banknote or CreditCard from lucide-react), and navigate to '/payment-settings' when clicked. Use the same card styling as the Product Management card for consistency. Ensure the card is visible to all authenticated users without role restrictions.
